message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its unique value, I'm offering it at $2,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay $2,000,000. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the price you're suggesting doesn't reflect the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to pay $1,750,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,300,000. I think this is a fair compromise.
